note.title: Our Philosophy:
note.desc: Ensuring disciplined trading through automated logic, regardless of market volatility.
features1.title: What You Get
features1.contentDesc: Focused on identifying meaningful opportunities — not constant noise.

features1.items.title: Market Analysis
features1.items.description: Detects trends and structural market shifts using objective price data, removing subjective bias.

features1.items.title: Adaptive Behavior
features1.items.description: Adjusts logic dynamically as market conditions shift, so you don't have to constantly tweak settings.

features1.items.title: Automated Execution
features1.items.description: Trades are executed instantly according to your rules, eliminating hesitation and emotional errors.

features2.contentDesc: Built to protect capital and enforce consistency.

features2.items.title: Risk Controls
features2.items.description: Integrated safeguards help limit drawdowns and control exposure automatically.

features2.items.title: Overtrading Protection
features2.items.description: Reduces activity during low-quality or choppy market phases to preserve your capital.

features2.items.title: Configurable Parameters
features2.items.description: Risk levels and strategy behavior can be fully adjusted to match your individual risk appetite.

steps.title: Simple by Design
steps.subtitle: The strategy runs directly on TradingView. It continuously scans price data, validates signals, and executes positions independently — freeing you from the screen.

steps.items.title: Data — Indicator Signal
steps.items.description: Our proprietary indicator scans the market 24/7. It generates a signal only when high-probability criteria are met.

steps.items.title: Logic — Signal to Trade
steps.items.description: Signals are instantly converted into trade instructions. The system automatically validates direction, size, and risk.

steps.items.title: Execution — Order Placement
steps.items.description: Validated instructions are executed immediately. Orders are placed with precision, following your strict parameters.

chart.title: Built on Data
chart.subtitle: Backed by extensive testing on historical data. We focus on realistic assumptions and controlled risk rather than curve-fitted optimization.

faqs.title: Good to Know
faqs.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.

faqs.items.title: Which markets are supported?
faqs.items.description: Optimized for Bitcoin but applicable to other volatile assets on timeframes above 4 hours.

faqs.items.title: Are all trades profitable?
faqs.items.description: No. We use intelligent risk management to minimize losses. Not every trade will be a winner.

faqs.items.title: Is my capital safe?
faqs.items.description: Yes. The system never accesses your wallet. You retain full control over your funds at all times.

faqs.items.title: Is there a trial?
faqs.items.description: Yes. Test the strategy for 7 days for free to evaluate its performance in your own environment.
